channel.title: Help with making my new server
channel.description:
Hey, I'm making a new server and I followed the guide but I got stuck at the run&compile.bat file part because I get this error everytime I start it...
[code]The System Cannot Find The Path Specified The System Cannot Find The Path Specified Press any key to continue...[/code]
Any ideas or help, would be much appreciated! :cool:

item.title: Help with making my new server
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:

try going www.silabsoft.com
[/quote]

You bumped a topic made about two years ago. Congratulations.[/quote]it’s teh moperscpa3r…

im pretty sure the kid found out how to do it, considering this was a over a month ago… so no more posts after this.

(beh, reported for lock)

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making my new server
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Joobieo, post:3, topic:4542”]Theres 2 folders there…1.50_5 and 1.50_7 [br][size=1]Posted at: July 09, 2006, 03:43:41 AM[/size][hr]Ive follow many guides and NONE AT ALL WORK…these guides assume everyone trying to make a server is a java expert, but im sorry ive NEVER USED JAVA and I need help here.[/quote]Actually, they don’t. They assume you know what directories are and have basic computer knowledge. Setting paths is EASY. Also, don’t try making a server when you don’t know how to use java. Learn java, THEN make a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making my new server
item.dc:creator: @ghostboy195 ghostboy195
item.description:
@ghostboy195 wrote:

ok, i had your problem. right click on run&compile and click edit. delete all of the stuff in it and replace it with:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Server
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server
pause

while replacing YOURSERVERNAME with your server name

Read full topic
